description: This Sesame Crunch Salad is easy to make and has the perfect blend of veggies, protein, and flavor!
name: Sesame Crunch Salad with Rice and Tofu
recipeIngredient: 1 bag Trader Joe’s Sesame Crunch Salad Mix
1 block Trader Joe’s super firm high protein tofu
1 bag Trader Joe’s organic jasmine rice, or you can use the brown rice

recipeInstructions.text: Take one bag of rice out of the box and microwave it for 3 minutes. Cut the top off and let it cool.

Pat tofu dry and dice it into cubes. Heat a large pan over medium heat and add about 1 teaspoon olive oil. Add the tofu and let cook for a few minutes until starting to brown. Pour in the soyaki sauce, you want enough to entirely coat the tofu, and mix together. Let cook another 5 minutes or so, stirring occasionally.

Pour the salad mix into a large bowl and then add the dressing. Stir and then add the rice and cooked tofu. Stir again until everything is combined and then top with a handful of chopped cilantro and the sesame seed and nori flake packet. Mix until combined and enjoy!
